item.title: Finding What We Needed on the Farm
item.description: A moment of success on the farm as a long-searched-for item or solution is finally found, highlighting its importance for daily work and operations.

media:content.media:title: Finding What We Needed on the Farm
media:content.media:description: A moment of success on the farm as a long-searched-for item or solution is finally found, highlighting its importance for daily work and operations.

item.title: Driveway Damage from Hauling Grain
item.description: Heavy grain loads take a toll on the farm driveway, showing how constant hauling can cause wear and the repairs needed to keep everything running smoothly.

item.title: Getting Stuck During Weekend Fieldwork
item.description: A look at a farmer’s unexpected setback while working on a Sunday, showing how equipment gets stuck and the effort needed to get back on track in the field.

item.title: The New Farm Has Lots Of Problems!
item.description: As the crew explores the new farm, they identify a number of issues that need attention and begin working through the challenges one by one.

item.title: Encountering a large sinkhole in the field
item.description: A routine job takes a dangerous turn when the crew encounters a massive sinkhole, forcing quick thinking and careful maneuvering to avoid disaster.

item.title: We Have Found The Worst Mud Of The Year!
item.description: The crew dives into some of the thickest, stickiest mud they’ve hit all season, turning a routine job into a messy challenge out in the fields.

item.title: We got a new ride!
item.description: A big day on the farm as the crew unveils their new tractor, showing off the features and power that will level up their work in the field.

item.title: He's Crabbin'
item.description: Out in the field, he tackles the day’s work with a mix of determination and frustration, earning the nickname “crabbin’” as the chores keep piling up.

item.title: We’re In A Selling Mood!!
item.description: The shop/farm is clearing out inventory! This video documents the full process of selling our equipment or goods, showing the negotiation, the logistics, and the excitement of making a big sale.

item.title: How Many Flat Tires Will We Get At The Scrap Yard!?
item.description: Every trip to the scrap yard is a gamble. We'll show you the full adventure, counting the flat tires we get and detailing the hidden hazards that make this a challenging equipment run.

item.title: Ever Wondered How a Planter Works?
item.description: Ever wondered how a planter works? This video explains the essential mechanics, showing how the machine prepares the seedbed, meters the seeds for precision, and ensures consistent depth for optimal crop growth.

item.title: Last Day Of Beans Harvest!! Geringhoff Header Review!
item.description: We finished the bean harvest! Join us for an in-depth review of the Geringhoff header, detailing its features and why it was essential for getting the job done right on the final day.

item.title: Recruiting More Equipment From The Trees To Be Used!!
item.description: We're on a mission to recruit old iron that's been sitting forgotten! This video shows the full process of clearing out the trees and salvaging valuable equipment to put it back to work.

item.title: The Combine Is Also Upset We’re Broke Down!
item.description: Even the machine seems frustrated! This video documents a major breakdown during a critical job, capturing the honest struggle and the hard work required to fix the combine and get the operation running again.

item.title: The Worst Job On The Farm!
item.description: Every farm has one—that job everyone dreads. We'll show you the full process of tackling the toughest, least-fun task and explain why we all hate this part of the routine.

item.title: The Start Of Soybean Harvest Is Off To A Great Start!
item.description: What does a great harvest look like? Join us in the field for the first day of the soybean harvest, detailing the equipment setup and the satisfying progress of a productive day.

item.title: Trying to get the three diggers out of the field
item.description: This is a big problem! Join us for a first-hand look at the complex logistics and hard work involved in recovering three stuck diggers, detailing the effort required to save the machines and finish the job.

item.title: 130 Bushel Corn Here We Come!
item.description: Join us in the field as we harvest our corn crop. This video details the equipment, techniques, and hard work that went into achieving a goal of 130 bushels per acre.

item.title: We Can’t Make It A Day Without Wrecking Something!
item.description: This is an honest look at a very challenging day. We'll show you the full story of the unforeseen mishap and the expensive lesson learned when a crucial piece of equipment was damaged.

item.title: Halo VRT In Action!
item.description: Go inside the field for a new equipment review. We'll show you the Halo VRT tackling tough soil, detailing the advanced technology and techniques used to prepare the perfect seedbed.
